name: CreateDeployedDevicesCertificate
description: Enroll a new Certificate credential to the Fleet, optionally giving it a friendly name and assigning to a Device.

CertificateData.description: Provides a URL encoded representation of the public certificate in PEM format.

DeviceSid.description: Provides the unique string identifier of an existing Device to become authenticated with this Certificate credential.

FriendlyName.description: Provides a human readable descriptive text for this Certificate credential, up to 256 characters long.

$ul: **account_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Account responsible for this Certificate credential.
**date_created**: Specifies the date this Certificate credential was created, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**date_updated**: Specifies the date this Certificate credential was last updated, given in UTC ISO 8601 format.
**device_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of a Device authenticated with this Certificate credential.
**fleet_sid**: Specifies the unique string identifier of the Fleet that the given Certificate credential belongs to.
**friendly_name**: Contains a human readable descriptive text for this Certificate credential, up to 256 characters long.
**sid**: Contains a 34 character string that uniquely identifies this Certificate credential resource.
**thumbprint**: Contains a unique hash of the payload of this Certificate credential, used to authenticate the Device.
**url**: Contains an absolute URL for this Certificate credential resource.
